name: 1-bit bounce
description:
My 1-bit style game entry to the mid year Flame Game Jam

Get to the finish line on the right of the platform by jumping, sliding and whatever means.

  • Use Left and Right arrows to nudge left or right.
  • Use Spacebar to jump

Framework: Flutter
Game engine: Flame Engine / Forge2D
Graphics: https://minisprit.es/

Github: https://github.com/fstof/one_bit_bounce
